quotes.quote: The oneness of human beings is the basic ethical thread that holds us together.
When traversing the vast sea of loneliness, Oneness is the only true safe harbor.
Be at peace in the oneness of things, and all errors will disappear by themselves.
The journey towards oneness emphasizes the opposites and we are caught in their conflict.
The great concepts of oneness and of majestic order seem always to be born in the desert.
The heart of the matter is always our oneness with divine spirit, our union with all life.
Oneness with Nature is the glory of childhood; oneness with childhood is the glory of the Teacher.
Transcendent Oneness does not require self-examination, self-help, or self-work. It requires self-loss.
Consider your own place in the universal oneness of which we are all a part, from which we all arise, and to which we all return.
Oneness is inner silence, which remains undisturbed by external factors. This silence is not the opposite of noise. That is inner Oneness.
If you want oneness in society, you have to teach people to go inside instead of going outside, because if they want peace, they need to find it within.
If you cannot reach a state of utter oneness with each other, how do you expect to solve anything? Separate the world will crumble; together the world will thrive.
All differences in this world are of degree, and not of kind, because oneness is the secret of everything.
Goodness Is oneness-love In perfect action.
Students achieving Oneness will move on to Twoness.
When we love others we see our oneness with others.
Unity does not mean sameness. It means oneness of purpose.
The prayer that is heard is not of many words....but of Oneness.
The final goal of all religions is to realise the essential oneness.
The oneness of community for instance is at the heart of our culture.
You tap in to this oneness and become part of the universe as a whole.
When there's nothing but humility, there's nothing but spiritual oneness.
As long as we separate this oneness into two we won't achieve realization.
The waves of hatred-night can easily be dissolved in the sea of oneness-love.
There is only one real comfort and it's not a feeling. It is the comfort of oneness.
A Oneness of all. An evolution in consciousness of us all that isn't about the egos.
We are all more or less ill till we find -Self-enquiry our Oneness with everyone else.
Loving friends let kindness grow in their hearts, creating a oneness with their souls.
On the platform of reality, on the platform of oneness of life, all differences dissolve.
The purpose of both, awareness and consciousness, is to lead us towards this path of Oneness.
